title: Buffalo National River: Permits & Reservations
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Permits & Reservations              Permits & Reservations       SPECIAL PARK USE PERMIT PROGRAM Special Use Permit forms and guidelines and additional information are available on the Special Park Uses page.  RESERVATIONS Reservations can be made in advance for campsites and pavilions at Buffalo Point, for group campsites and the pavilion at Tyler Bend and the pavilion at Ozark by calling (877) 444-6777 or on line at www.Recreation.gov. Group sites at Erbie can be reserved by calling Tyler Bend Visitor Center at 870-439-2502. A fee will be charged for handling reservations through Recreation.gov. Please be aware that some special events held at the pavilions (such as weddings, press receptions, concerts, et al) will require a Special Use Permit in addition to the pavilion reservation.
